org.mini2Dx.core.graphics

Interface Shader

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    LibgdxShader

    public interface Shader
extends org.mini2Dx.gdx.utils.Disposable
    Interface to platform-specific shader implementations

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Binds the shader for parameter modification
      void end()
      Unbinds the shader for parameter modification

      Returns the ShaderType (Note: different platforms require different types)

      Returns if this shader compiled successfully

    • Method Detail

      • begin

        void begin()
        Binds the shader for parameter modification

      • end

        void end()
        Unbinds the shader for parameter modification

      • hasParameter

        boolean hasParameter(java.lang.String name)
        Checks if the shader has the specified parameter (uniform, attribute, etc.).
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter name
        Returns:
        False if the uniform, attribute, etc. does not exist

      • setParameter

        void setParameter(java.lang.String name,
                  Texture texture)
        Sets the specified texture parameter. Automatically allocates a bind ID for the texture on OpenGL platforms. Note: begin() must be called before using this method
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter name
        texture - The texture to bind to the parameter

      • setParameter

        void setParameter(java.lang.String name,
                  int bindId,
                  Texture texture)
        Sets the specified texture parameter. Note: begin() must be called before using this method
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter name
        bindId - The texture bind ID to use on OpenGL platforms
        texture - The texture to bind to the parameter

      • setParameterf

        Sets the specified float parameter (uniform). Note: begin() must be called before using this method
        Parameters:
        name - The parameter name
        value -
